sentences.sContent: King was a worldwide symbol of nonviolent protest against racial injustice.
sentences.sCn: 金是全世界以非暴力抗议种族不平等的象征。

sentences.sContent: I would only belong to an environmental movement if it was explicitly nonviolent.
sentences.sCn: 我只会投身一个明确宣称只用非暴力手段的环护运动。

trans.tranOther: Nonviolent methods of bringing about change do not involve hurting people or causing damage
